name: A Vision of Hell
description:
A Vision of Hell is an experimental journey through hell as portrayed by El Bosco in his painting Garden of Earthly Delights.

You’ll get to move around the painting while listening to the very same sounds of hell recorded by Germán de Argumosa in 1985. The recorded fragments are part of one of the most famous Spanish psychophonies. 

Turn of the lights. 

Use headphones.

Move around the painting with WASD or arrows.

I was only able to create this nightmarish experiment thanks to: 

  • Quike Zárraga & Marc  with the coding
  • Rafer & Bini and their visual tips
